channel.title: The Ultimate Sans Undertale Forum Mafia (SIGNUP THREAD) (12/12)
channel.description:
![ultimate%20sans%20fm|690x388](upload://3QbohzJROdC1hnmhJRgXCuWRIPk.png)
# [Game Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-sans-undertale-game-thread-day-1-lynches-in-his-ass-sunday/74896/2)
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 days/72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 day/24 hours long Actions are done by messaging me The Genocide Faction will talk through a Forum DM. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. This is a Smalltown game, therefore everyone's class names will show up on thread and there are no bullshit post restrictions.
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once majority has been reached. That player will be flipped.
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you.
### Journals There are no logbooks in this game.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **Closed Setup Idiot** **[color=lime]9 x Pacifist Faction[/color]** **[color=red]3 x Genocide Faction[/color]**
Players: 1. MaximusPrime 2. BlueStorm 3. Geyde 4. Lv. 110 Mafia Boss 5. Hjasik 6. Squid 7. Luxy 8. Frostwolf 9. DatBird 10. Zone_Q11 11. bazingaboy 12. Margaret
